history.title: Our historical hotel
history.bio: Our hotel was built in 1625 and has a rich history of 400 years. It offers a combination of modern amenities and a historic setting. Each room has its own historical features, providing guests with an unforgettable experience.

house.title: Our rooms
house.bio: Each room combines a historic atmosphere and modern amenities

footer.bio: This hotel has a 400-year history and warmly welcomes every guest.
